meanings.definition: A large organized military force equipped for fighting on land.
meanings.sent1: The army marched in formation towards the enemy.
meanings.sent2: The country's army defended its borders from invasion.
meanings.sent3: The army of ants worked together to carry the food back to their nest.
meanings.sent4: The army of clouds gathered ominously on the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The army of trees stood tall and strong in the forest.

meanings.definition: A large number of people or things, typically organized and acting together.
meanings.sent1: An army of volunteers helped clean up the park.
meanings.sent2: The army of fans cheered loudly at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The army of pencils in my drawer seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent4: The army of stars twinkled in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The army of workers efficiently completed the construction project.
